Class Project

java.lang.Object
  Project
All Implemented Interfaces:
hasNotes
public class Project
extends Object
implements hasNotes

A class to manage project for the program. Contain all the attributes and methods necessarry that are needed to work with project Also work with objects contain inside a project (references and notes)

Version:
2010.10.26
Author:
Tin Huynh

                                String newDate,
                                String newText,
                                BufferedReader br)
                         throws IOException
Check whether a Note with the same name and date already exists in the requested project

Parameters:
projectName - name of the project that has note being checked
newDate - date created of the Note to be checked
newText - content of the Note to be checked
br - used to read from text file
Returns:
a boolean that states whether the Note is existed or not

saveNoteToFile

public static void saveNoteToFile(String projName,
                                  String noteText,
                                  String dateCreated,
                                  BufferedReader br)
                           throws IOException
Save the Note'states of the project to text file Class Project will be responsible for writing its note to text file because note'states information resides in the project text file

Parameters:
projName - name of the project that has note being saved
noteText - content of the Note to be added to the project
dateCreated - date created of the Note to be added to the project
br - used to read from text file
Throws:
IOException - If an input or output exception occurred
FileNotFoundException - If the text file cannot be found
NumberFormatException - If the found Note Number cannot be parsed to an Integer

                              String newBriefDesc,
                              BufferedWriter bw,
                              BufferedReader br,
                              ArrayList<String> refList,
                              String noteText,
                              String noteDate)
                       throws IOException
Save append new project'states to text file.

Parameters:
newName - name of the project
newBriefDesc - brief description of the project
bw - used to write to text file
br - used to read from text file
refList - list of reference numbers to be added to the project
noteText - content of the Note to be added to the project
noteDate - date created of the Note to be added to the project
Throws:
IOException - If an input or output exception occurred
FileNotFoundException - If the text file cannot be found
NumberFormatException - If the found Project Number cannot be parsed to an Integer

searchProjectNotes

public static ArrayList<String> searchProjectNotes(String keyword,
                                                   BufferedReader br)
                                            throws IOException
read and match the Note with text contains the supplied keyword. if found, add this Note's DateCreated, Text and Name of the project containing it to an array of String

Parameters:
keyword - the keyword used to filter the Note, filter is applied on Note Text
br - used to read from text file
Returns:
ArrayList array contains data about the found Notes
Throws:
IOException - if there is any error when input or output

searchProjects

public static ArrayList<Project> searchProjects(String keyword,
                                                BufferedReader br)
                                         throws IOException
read from text file and find keyword in each Project name if found, crate a Project, load its attributes and add it to the list

Parameters:
keyword - the keyword used to filter the Project, filter is applied on Project Name
br - used to read from text file
Returns:
ArrayList array contains list of found Projects
Throws:
IOException - if there is any error when input or output

validateEditNote

public static boolean validateEditNote(String projName,
                                       String oldNoteDate,
                                       String oldNoteText,
                                       String newNoteDate,
                                       String newNoteText,
                                       BufferedReader br)
                                throws IOException
Check to ensure the editing Note does not change its DateCreated and Text to a same combination of DateCreated and Text of any other Note in a same project Rename the copy file and delete the original file

Parameters:
projName - name of the project that has note being edited
oldNoteDate - current DateCreated of the Note being edited
oldNoteText - current Text of the Note being edited
newNoteDate - new DateCreated of the Note being edited
newNoteText - new Text of the Note being edited
br - used to read from text file
Returns:
a boolean that states whether the new DateCreated and Text are duplicated
Throws:
IOException - If an input or output exception occurred

validateEditProjectName

public static boolean validateEditProjectName(String oldName,
                                              String newName,
                                              BufferedReader br)
                                       throws IOException

Parameters:
oldName - current name of the project that is being edited
newName - new name of the project that is being edited
br - used to read from text file
Returns:
a boolean that states whether the new name duplicates with another projects' names

IOException - If an input or output exception occurred
